channel.title: Redash 10 image for GCP
channel.description: Hello Is there a plan to release image for GCP for redash version 10? I see there are docker images with 10, but for GCP images I found only gs://redash-images/redash.8.0.0-b32245-1.tar.gz I am preparing terraform for GCP and deploying right image (without upgrade would make my life easier)

item.title: Redash 10 image for GCP
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
V10 images for GCP are not yet available. That is one of the follow-up items.

Read full topic

item.title: Redash 10 image for GCP
item.dc:creator: yishikawa
item.description:
I’m also looking for V10 image on GCP.

Path looks like

gs://redash-images/redash.10.0.0-b50363.tar.gz

but read permission is not provided

  • Required ‘read’ permission for ‘redash.10.0.0-b50363.tar.gz’

Read full topic

item.title: Redash 10 image for GCP
item.dc:creator: pappfire
item.description:
Hello
Is there a plan to release image for GCP for redash version 10? I see there are docker images with 10, but for GCP images I found only gs://redash-images/redash.8.0.0-b32245-1.tar.gz
I am preparing terraform for GCP and deploying right image (without upgrade would make my life easier)

Read full topic
